::Optimus Prime::

    Galvatron was gone, but Prime was going. The Matrix =
of War's blast had hit Prime dead centre in the chest. Prime stumbled and d=
ropped his gun. He held his chest and then fell to the ground. His body bec=
ame blackened, he was dead. Prime's chest comaprtment opened and out came t=
he Matrix of Leadership. This one too started to implode, it vanished into =
nothingness, taking Prime's Spark with it.

(If I return, Prime will come b=
ack, so nobody takes him. Or for that matter the Autobot Matrix of Leadersh=
ip. Good-bye all.)

  From: kinger01030@cs.c=

 Subject: Re: Galvatron vs. Prime the ultimate battle


  Galvatron shot so=
me final blasts of cannon energy and his matrix of War shot 
  of a great b=
lack beam. He aimed it trying to cancel out his beam but it 
  missed they =
passed by eachother. Galvatron looked in horror as the beam 
  incenerated =
his body inch by inch starting at his feet. He cried out. "Ill be 
  back..=
.I always come back!" he incenerated only leaveing the matrox of War 
  and=
 Galvatron's spark inside it. It seemed to inplode on itself and 
  disappe=
ared into nothingness. 
  OCC: I wish to reserve the character Galvatron an=
d his matrix of War thank 
  you. This is my goodbye. Playing in this rpg h=
as been great. I hope you all 
  have fun and I will see you soon. Go allia=
nce kick some decepticon butt.
